page.title: 15FAVOURITE POSSESSIONS
page.content:
All the 14 year olds questioned about their home life took great pride in their{possessions.}They are not able to afford many large items, although their favourite possessions are generally neither large or expensive, but have great sentimental value. A sample study of 14 year old boys and girls produced these results: {FAVOURITE POSSESSIONS}
JEWELLERY BOX {** KEYBOARD {****} COMPUTER {**************} BICYCLE {*** HORSE {**} DOG { ***} VIDEO RECORDER {*} POSTERS {****} TELEVISION SET {*****}
